overview: Protagonist Ajit fights against Vikram & Bablu, sons of land mafia Thakur Amarpal & Thakur Samarpal. Shiva helps Ajit to take avenge against casteism. Antagonist Bablu & Vikram leaves no chance to expand their empire by hook or crook. Tragedy, betrayal & lust of power fuels Thakurain Pushpa to prepare a fierce battle against her husband. But revenge comes at great costs,so as everyone pays for it.
title: Laal Zameen
